From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Dollen::

        The pod kept flying, and Dollen looked at some scenery while flying.
Soon, he spotted the base below.  He slowly flew downwards, carefully.
Suddenly, an image of the beautiful bot struck his mind.  He jumped, and he
accidentally pushed the steering handle to the left.  The pod went racing
diagonally going straight towards the ground.  He knew they were going to
crash.  He got out of his seat, and jumped in front of GoldenEye to prevent
her from flying out.  The pod hit the ground, and went skidding.  It hit a
tree, and Dollen went flying right through the windshield and hit the tree.
He lay on the front of the smashed up pod, lifelessly.  They were just
outside the base, luckily they hadn't crashed into it.  But Dollen wasn't so
lucky.
